# SketchColor

copy form react-color, but only have SketchColor

## install

```bash
npm i @chenshuai2144/sketch-color --save-dev
yarn add @chenshuai2144/sketch-color
```

## Getting Started

Install dependencies,

```bash
$ npm i
```

Start the dev server,

```bash
$ npm start
```

Build documentation,

```bash
$ npm run docs:build
```

Run test,

```bash
$ npm test
```

Build library via `father-build`,

```bash
$ npm run build
```
